column1: The plaintiff agreed to the terms with satisfaction.
The contract was violated multiple times without notice.
All parties signed the agreement peacefully.
The client expressed frustration with the legal services.
No further action was deemed necessary by either party.
An appeal was filed following the initial ruling.
The investigation was inconclusive and closed.
The defendant acknowledged the breach and offered compensation.
Settlement was reached without any formal court proceedings.
The judge criticized the lack of evidence presented.
